ing: 2 (3.4 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix
2 (11 ounce) cans mandarin orange segments, drained
1 (20 ounce) package chocolate sandwich cookies, crushed
des: "Crushed chocolate sandwich cookies and succulent mandarin orange segments are enfolded in cool and tangy vanilla cream in this crowd-pleasing dessert salad!"
ins: In a large bowl, mix together the pudding mix, buttermilk and whipped topping.  Cover and refrigerate until serving.  Just before serving, fold in the oranges and cookie crumbs.
